pullRequest.title: Improved metrics
pullRequest.bodyText:
This updates metrics with new resolution for Kotlin support and target to track if project is an application or library.
Also adds parallel segment upload.

nodes.bodyText: Is the dependency name just the "middle" part? e.g. this would normally be org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib-jdk7:1.3.72, so it doesn't start with org. ?
Nitpick. I would check for each case specifically and if we couldn't detect either app or library use "unknown"?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -154,8 +153,17 @@ class RealmTransformer(val project: Project) : Transform() {
             val targetSdk: String? = project.getTargetSdk()
             val minSdk: String?  = project.getMinSdk()
             val sync: Boolean = Utils.isSyncEnabled(project)
-            val analytics = RealmAnalytics(packages, containsKotlin, sync, targetSdk, minSdk)
-            analytics.execute()
+            val app = project.plugins.findPlugin("com.android.application") != null
